emuInput.TitMainTitle: Centenarian David Wilson walking through curtains of voting booth
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 6, 1948, pg. 2, reads: "Centenarians Cast Their Votes - Civil War Vet - Right in thick of the voting was Civil War veteran David Wilson of 2426 Centre Avenue, who says he was born in 1848. Shown, with him are Mrs. Nannie G. Moone and John Thompson, city detective. - Harris Photo."
